story.text: NEW YORK Jan 3 Macrovision Corp. MVSN.O said on Wednesday it acquired privately held Mediabolic Inc., a provider of software for televisions, set-top boxes and digital video recorders, for $43.5 million in cash on Jan. 1. The acquisition is expected to be accretive in 2008 but dilutive to Macrovision's earnings in 2007 by up to 10 cents per share, Macrovision said in a statement.
